mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM shop_product_specification a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_product_specification( id, product_id, name, inventory, need_integration, color ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{productId}, #{name}, #{inventory}, #{needIntegration}, #{color} )
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_product_specification SET product_id = #{productId}, name = #{name}, inventory = #{inventory}, need_integration = #{needIntegration}, color = #{color} WHERE id = #{id}
